Play:
The Maiden's Colorful Fan
(Gokusaishiki musume ōgi / 極彩色娘扇)

Written By: Chikamatsu Hanji (近松半二) , Kitamado Goichi (北窓後一) , Takemoto Saburobei (竹本三郎兵衛) , Miyoshi Shōraku (三好松洛)

First Staged: 1760

Reference: Hironaga, Shūzaburō, The Bunraku Handbook (Tokyo: Maison des Arts, 1976); Bunraku September 1972 Performance Program

– Click image to view.

Performances:

September 1972: The Maiden's Colorful Fan

July 1977 Asahiza: The Maiden's Colorful Fan

Characters:

Hyosuke's mother (Haha Okō / 母お幸)

Hyosuke (Terakoya Hyōsuke / 寺子屋兵助)

Fudematsu (Segare Fudematsu / 伜筆松)

Otsuru, Tobei's wife (Nyōbō Otsuru / 女房おつる)

Ohaya (Tenaraiko Ohaya / 手習子お早)

Ohana (Tenaraiko Ohana / 手習子お花)

Omaki, Hyosuke's wife (Nyōbō Omaki / 女房お牧)

Gambei (Ani Ganbei / 兄眼兵衛)

Dampachi (Tedai Danpachi / 手代段八)

Tobei (Asaina (Asahina) Tōbei / 朝日奈藤兵衛)

School children (Tenaraiko / 手習子)
